parameter.name: responseType
parameter.description: The type of the response of getTimeZone method.

parameter.name: longitude
parameter.description: The longitude to which the time zone is retrieved.

parameter.name: latitude
parameter.description: The latitude to which the time zone is retrieved.

parameter.name: radius
parameter.description: The radius which is used to buffer in km for closest timezone in coastal areas.

parameter.name: language
parameter.description: The language of the country to identify the country.

parameter.name: date
parameter.description: The date to which the timezone is retrieved.
